https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/145rfYd3bwaXm6uBAXGyYQ8YMYa.jpg 13 yrs after the American Civil War, in a strange town in New Mexico, a gunfighter and his gambler woman search for the lost Confederate fortune. Things turn deadly when they cross paths with a demented preacher who has other plans. A Prayer for the Damned
